mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM workflow_package wp INNER JOIN site s ON s.id = wp.site_id INNER JOIN user au ON au.id = wp.author INNER JOIN user ru ON ru.id = wp.reviewer WHERE s.site_id = #{siteId} AND s.deleted = 0
AND wp.status = #{status}
AND DATE(wp.schedule) >= DATE(#{fromDate})
AND DATE(wp.schedule)) <= DATE(#{toDate})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO workflow_package (id, site_id, status, publishing_target, schedule, author, author_comment, label) VALUES (#{id}, #{siteId}, #{status}, #{publishingTarget}, #{schedule}, #{authorId}, #{authorComment}, #{label})
